about_the_game:
Horizontal Movement

Players can press the left and right arrow keys to move horizontally.

Use skills to avoid danger

Pressing the corresponding button allows you to activate the skill to dodge the Boss' attack.

Release the ult and attack the Boss

Players use up all their current energy to launch an attack against enemy characters, reducing their health. When releasing energy to attack, there is a brief period of invincibility.

Pixel Art Style Characters and Level Design

The game will feature a blend of Japanese JRPG-style illustrations and pixel art, offering players a unique and non-repetitive experience with newly designed maps, scenes, and floor mechanisms in each level!

Blending Nostalgic Gameplay with New Elements

The core gameplay mechanics of this game are inspired by a Japanese action game called "NS-SHAFT." Our game features many new elements, including special floor mechanisms, mid-air techniques, and boss attacks, providing players with a challenging level experience!

Carefully Designed Bosses and Levels

The game includes meticulously designed boss battles, with each boss featuring unique appearances and attack patterns. These diverse attacks will challenge players' reaction times.

To face these powerful bosses, players can choose from different characters and items, each with their own passive abilities and special skills. Completing levels unlocks the defeated boss characters as playable characters.

Enhanced Pixel Art and Voice Acting

The full version of the game will include more pixel animations and Japanese voice acting in select story scenes to enhance the immersive experience!

CV:伊ヶ崎綾香
The queen of the Sky Tower, born with the powerful magical artifact, the "Frost Orb."

She is pure-hearted and kind, doesn't dislike humans, and often gets carried away.

CV:花城かざり
A determined gambler who never gives up until she wins.

Playful and mischievous, she enjoys pranks.

As the casino manager, she sometimes shows a cold and ruthless side.

CV:大宗たゆゆ
Appears as a gentle older sister with a semi-transparent body.

She has a strong desire to care for those she likes.

Her body is similar in size to a normal human, but she can grow infinitely if she absorbs water.

CV:財木 桜
She upholds her family's mission to protect the Maple Garden.

Although she seems strict, she has a pure heart and loves children.

CV:園宮さつき
Wears a hooded coat, usually keeping her head covered.

She enjoys being contrary, is easily embarrassed, and dislikes her metallic tail.

In a distant realm, the protagonist Tavaro was piloting his aircraft when he suddenly encountered a storm and crashed into the crystal palace atop the Sky Tower.

The Sky Tower is located at the central region of the continent, a towering structure teeming with monsters and traps. The crystal palace serves as the central hub ruling over the Sky Tower. At that moment, Frostia, the lord of the crystal palace, was fiddling with the frost orb that controls the entire palace...

As a result of Tavaro's collision, Frostia accidentally dropped the orb towards the base of the tower, causing the monsters in the Sky Tower to lose control and go berserk.

To help Frostia retrieve the lost orb, Tavaro used his experience to guide her in landing techniques, and they journeyed downward together. They faced trap-laden floors and malevolent monster lords. Thus, a journey filled with unknown challenges began...

highlighted.name: No matter what you're having, I'll have a serving too
All a broken machine needs is a knock and it will be fine

content_descriptors.notes:
!!Warning!! 
This game adult content including full nudity, sexual scenes. please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 20.

!!Content!! 
The game features an otherworldly monster girl theme, including elements of pure love, comedy, and harem. Please play with confidence.

name: Falling with Ice Phoenix!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Sexo Explícito
Linguagem imprópria
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Falling with Ice Phoenix! combining the classic gravity fall platformer, sprited and high-octane action game, you and the cutie monster girls venture downwards to find the lost orb, facing traps and sexy monster lords ahead, an exciting adventure to the unknown lays ahead...
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
